decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: A001 P1 Location Plan; A010 P1 Existing GF Plan; A011 P1 Existing 1F Plan; A012 P1 Existing Loft Plan; A013 P1 Existing Roof Plan; A020 P1 Existing Elevation 1 of 2; A021 P1 Existing Elevation 2 of 2; A100 P1 Proposed GF Plan; A101 P1 Proposed 1F Plan; A102 P1 Proposed Loft Plan; A103 P1 Proposed Roof Plan; A120 P1 Proposed Elevation 1 of 2; A121 P1 Proposed Elevation 2 of 2; A130 P1 Proposed Section; Design & Access Statement P1 prepared by J79 Studio dated 2 November 2021.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. | The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies D3 & D4 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), polices 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the Adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012). | No part of the flat roofs of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area, unless specified on drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policy D6 of the London Plan (2021). | The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall not project more than 150mm from the roof plane and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).
description: Rear roof extension incorporating a balcony/terrace; part rear roof extension to outrigger roof slope; installation of three rooflights to front roof slope
